content: yarn used king cole big value super chunky 1 ball shade fern needle uk10mm/us15 straight notions cable needle or stitch holder gauge 10sts-15rows-10cms-blocked garter stitch finished measurements after blocking length-62cms width-15cms abbreviations k knit p purl sts stitches rs right side ws wrong side kfb knit into front and back of next stitch k2tog knit two stitches together c6b cable six back-slip next three stitches onto cable needle and hold at back of work k3 then knit 3sts from cable needle c6f cable six forward-slip next three stitches onto cable needle and hold at front of work k3 then knit 3sts from cable needle t5b slip next 2sts onto cable needle and hold at back of work k3 then p2 from cable needle t5f slip next 3sts onto cable needle and hold at front of work p2 then k3 from cable needle instructions using 10mm needles cast on 18sts next 5 row knit next row increase row k2 kfb until last 3 sts k3 23sts main pattern 1st row rs k7 p4 c6b p2 k4 2nd row k6 p6 k4 p3 k4 3rd row p4 t5f t5b t5f p4 4th row p7 k4 p6 k2 p4 5th row k4 p2 c6f p4 k7 6th row k4 p3 k4 p6 k6 7th row p4 t5b t5f t5b p4 8th row p4 k2 p6 k4 p7 work row 1-8 for a total of 72 row nine pattern repeats next row decrease row k2 k2tog until last 3 sts k3 18sts next 5 row knit cast off loosely and weave in ends blocking wash garment following instructions on ball band and pin out to finished measurements gently stem then leave until completely dry fasten with a shawl pin to wear © copyright 2024 brian smith all rights reserved for personal use only
